td.content: s:a 52 yr old white M presents with mild deterioration of eye sight, mild problem with seeing at night and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for past 6 weeks. occasional EtOH he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 177 cm, Weight 85.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
